EmailTemplate.description: Temp Signs Email to customer with payment instructions upon approval
EmailTemplate.name: Temp Signs Invoice Generated Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Request Approved and Invoice is Attached
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your request has been approved! The total for your request is {!Case.Net_Due__c}. Please note that payment is due by {!Case.Payment_Due_Date__c} and we cannot accept payment after this date.
To make a payment online, please follow the link below and click the Visa button to enter your credit card information securely. Otherwise, please write and send a check payable to the SFMTA. Installation of your request will not begin until payment has been received and processed.
{!Case.Link}
Please review your attached invoice.
Thank you, SFMTA
